description:
A do-it-all canoe for novices and veterans alike. It's spacious hull and a large weight capacity mean you won't need to skimp on food or comforts for weeks on the water. The minimal rocker and pointed bow and stern track well, while still being easy to manoeuvre when loaded down. The plastic hull withstands the abuse of the boniest rivers and shorelines, providing peace of mind on longer expeditions.

  • Durable triple-layer polyethylene hull handles midstream obstacles and beach landings
  • Lightweight aluminum gunwales for maintenance-free durability
  • Seat is nylon laced ash, ash yoke and thwart
  • Comfortable carrying handles help for transport
name: Old Town Penobscot 174
